title: Lola M. Thorson
maintext: HOUSTON — Lola M. Thorson, 96, of Houston died Tuesday, Jan. 23, 2018, at Valley View Healthcare and Rehab in Houston. Hoff Funeral Service in Houston is assisting the family with arrangements.
